name: Versa
headline: Smart receipts for your business spend
description: Versa is a merchant-owned network, through which merchants securely send purchase details to buyers. You'll automate government-mandated receipt capture, reduce chargebacks, and grow sales.

founders.name: Ted Power, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Bend (S22), former co-founder of Abacus (W14), formerly Google, Venmo, Foursquare

founders.name: Thomas Moore, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Versa (S22), formerly engineering @ Abacus — Brooklyn resident, grown in Redmond

generated_description:
**Versa: Smart Receipts for Your Business Spend**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from New York, Versa is a dynamic fintech startup that operates within the Y Combinator Batch S22. With a lean team of just two employees, the company’s mission is to simplify the often cumbersome process of receipt management for businesses. You might think of them as the clever friend who makes sure you never lose track of your expenses again.

**What Does Versa Do?**

Versa’s unique proposition lies in providing an automated solution for receipt capture and management. Imagine a world where merchants can seamlessly send purchase details directly to buyers, reducing the chaos of paperwork. By automating government-mandated receipt capture, Versa not only helps in adhering to compliance standards but also minimizes chargebacks—those pesky disputes that keep finance teams awake at night.

Using Versa, businesses can receive IRS-ready and VAT-valid receipts directly onto their expense management apps. This means less hassle for finance teams and fewer missing receipt support calls. The best part? Merchants can integrate with Versa at no cost, making it a win-win situation for both parties.

**Why is it Important?**

In an era where businesses are required to keep detailed track of every incurred expense, having a reliable way to collect receipts is vital. Versa addresses this need by offering a service that is not just efficient but trustworthy—receipt data is encrypted and sent directly to authorized receivers, bypassing Versa’s servers entirely. This ensures that neither Versa nor any third party can snoop on sensitive financial details. 

**The Takeaway**

With the push toward automation and digitalization in the business landscape, Versa is positioned to make its mark in the fintech arena. By simplifying the receipt management process, they help businesses focus on what they do best—growing and serving their customers. Plus, with backing from the well-regarded Y Combinator, Versa is set up for growth. 

If you’re looking into consolidating your business expenses effortlessly while staying compliant, it might be worth checking out what Versa has to offer. You can learn more on their [website](https://versa.org) or get in touch to see how they can streamline your receipt management.
